Texts.Eng: ...ahf'- fm'latgh geb ehye chtenff k'yarnak...
...kn'a lw'nafh nilgh'ri ooboshu phlegeth shtunggli...
<the whispers are growing louder>
<you hear some sort of whispers in the dark>

Texts.Chs: 先生，我不建议你吞噬自己的身体，因为你终究还是会把自己吃完，那时候你还剩什么呢？再说了，如今你已经血流不止，你应该停下这种毫无意义的行为。
Texts.Eng: Biting ones own body and eating it is probably not the best idea, sir. I don't suggest doing that again. Eventually you'll run out of pieces, and then what will you have left to eat? Also, now you're bleeding everywhere. Nicely done.
I ^red;******* *****^reset; ? We should ^red;******^reset; before it is ^red;******^reset;. Okay?
I am detect^red;*******^reset; ^red;*buzz*^reset;! Take ^red;******^reset; or it ^red;******^reset;!
I can't fathom what could have... This is beyond description. I...we... *vomiting sounds*. We must push on. We owe it to them.

I'll be with you during this investigation. As director I need to know what's going on at my facilities, after all. You seem to be at the location of the backup teleporter. The main must be offline for some reason.

Impossible. This has to be due to interference. Scans place the age of this place at somewhere around 1 billion years. I must know more. Continue onward, please. I should ^red;***** *** ******^reset;!

Interesting. A mutated form of ^red;*******^reset;, tainted with some sort of unknown biological agent. I should also point out that they appear rabid, and may possess any number of terrible ^red;******^reset; diseases.

It appears the lock has been sabotaged. Perhaps you could try blasting the door open with an explosiv^red;***** ** ****^reset;? There seems to be little other choice. A ^red;****^reset; storm is coming!
Lagash ni'mofghek Shoggoth! IA! IA! IA!
MacReady? What has happened to him? What's on his face? Whatever it is, he's exceptionally hostile. I suppose you have no choice but to defend yourself.

Odd. There is only one life-sign matching known sentient species. I am also picking up readings that match nothing I've ^red;****^reset;. The connec^red;*** ***^reset;blems are ^red;****^reset; scans.
Secret knowledge! We should search these shelves and ^red;**** **^reset; anything we find. Who knows what useful information or ancient ^red;**** *****^reset;we might uncover in the process!
Sensors are picking up faint bio signatures. Stand by while I ^red;****^reset;...hmm. The weather is interfering with our connection. SAIL can guide you should our connection fail completely.
The power breakers are at the end of this corridor. You should be able to enable power to the entire facility there.
The storm is ^red;******^reset; ^red;******^reset;. My scanners are ^red;*bzzzzzzzzzz*^reset; and ^red;******^reset;. I am ^red;******^reset;.
The way forward seems to be blocked. Progress is going to require a way to fit into exceptionally tight spaces. Perhaps a Translocator or a Microsphere tech would do the trick.
This pillar...what manner of stone is this? I'm not even sure it *is* stone. I can't seem to find any common identifiers with known minerals, at any rate. Onward. Discovery awaits.
This sculpture somewhat resembles ^red;********^reset;e Ruin. There are key differe^red;*******^reset; factors, of course. Some sort of ancient Ruin worship, perhaps?
This storm is quite something. Perhaps take shelter in the cliffs ahead. Without a doubt, the mountain wall will provide a barrier between you and the blizzard. Our connection will likely fail soon.
To progress, you'll likely need to search for a hint within the tomes on the shelves. We should keep an eye out for other such objects.
We need to find out what happened to the science team, and see if anyone is still here. Where is everyone? Who broke the lock?
What manner of ^red;*****^reset; is this, and what became of them? Nothing ever recorded matches this...thing. Whatever this place is, it will redefine galactic history.

Texts.Chs: 无论这是什么，都不像是我所见过的任何事物。我尝试分析但确实没能得到任何有用信息。而且它仍然在搏动着...
Texts.Eng: Whatever the hell this thing is, it reads unlike anything I have ever seen before. I literally get nothing when I try, yet it moves and pulses...

Texts.Chs: 我建议你小心行事，尽管我十分钦佩你敢于触摸这令人感觉不妙的祭坛的勇气。也许从古老的传说中，我们可以了解它的奥秘...
Texts.Eng: While I applaud your bravery even touching this altar, I would advise caution. It clearly is not a good thing. Perhaps some lore can shed light on how to use it...

While I can't fault you for wanting to leave, I would suggest making certain you have not missed any clues. Check piles of lab papers, shelves, filing cabinets...we need to know what is going on here.
You'll find a failsafe switch on the far wall of this room. It should override the main lab doors, which should give us access to the power breakers so we can see more clearly.
You're a bit out of the way, but imaging shows that the ^orange;Research Station^reset; can be reached by rapelling down the nearby cliff. Watch your step!
^orange;-ONLINE-^reset; You're ALIVE! I thought for certain you were dead! What did you discover about the temple, and what happened to our team? Report to me as soon as you can with your findings.
^red;*******bzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzt*****^reset;  ^orange;-CONNECTION TERMINATED-^reset;
ph'nglui mglw'nafh Cthulhu R'lyeh wgah'nagl fhtagn!
